channel.title: Help! Get pk points on death
channel.description: Hi, I have been trying to figure this problem out for a while and the problem is when I die sometimes, whether it be from a player or from a NPC the player will randomly get pk points. Im using the torvapkz v2 source and client, its PI base. If anyone can help it would be of great appreciation and thanks!

item.title: Help! Get pk points on death
item.dc:creator: @tigman9 tigman9
item.description:
@tigman9 wrote:

this is my applydead void in playerassistant.java

public void applyDead() { c.respawnTimer = 15; c.isDead = false; Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId]; if(c.duelStatus != 6) { c.killerId = findKiller(); if(o != null) { c.playerKilled = c.playerId; if(o.duelStatus == 5) { o.duelStatus++; } if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom != o.lastKilled && c.duelStatus == 0) { o.pkPoints = (o.pkPoints + 2); o.sendMessage("You recieved 2 STD's"); o.lastKilled = Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom; } else { o.sendMessage("You do not recieve STD's because you have killed " +c.playerName+ " twice in a row."); } } } c.faceUpdate(0); c.npcIndex = 0; c.playerIndex = 0; c.stopMovement(); if (c.duelStatus <= 4) { c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); } else if(c.duelStatus != 6 || !c.inArena()) { c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!"); /*o.getPA().movePlayer( Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_X + (Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_Y + (Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), 0);*/ } resetDamageDone(); c.DC++; o.KC++; c.specAmount = 10; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]); c.lastVeng = 0; c.vengOn = false; resetFollowers(); c.attackTimer = 10; if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId].connectedFrom.equals(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerKilled].connectedFrom)) { o.sendMessage("You Don't Recieve STD's for killing yourself!"); c.faceUpdate(0); c.npcIndex = 0; c.playerIndex = 0; c.stopMovement(); if(c.duelStatus <= 4) { c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); } else if(c.duelStatus != 6) { c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!"); } resetDamageDone(); c.lastVeng = 0; c.vengOn = false; resetFollowers(); c.attackTimer = 10; removeAllWindows(); c.tradeResetNeeded = true; return; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Help! Get pk points on death

item.title: Help! Get pk points on death
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

If you die in wilderness i think is what it states then your killer gets pts, however your killer hasnt been defined as someone other then your self just add a code saying if killer != playerId, or something similar and it should resolve your issue.

Read full topic
